Nightlight/Trinity/Termitron:

Nightlight looked to Termitron and said "Termitron, take Trinity and 
go to Trinity's quarters, perhaps we have toprepare to leave the 
ship.. Trinity, i'll go with you soon..."

Trinity nodded and hugged Termitron, who walked towards Trinity's 
quartes. As soon as they left, Nightlight looked to Aerotaur and 
said "Are we in a serious danger if we stay here inside the base???"
